details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Implementation limits - DeviceN components
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain a DeviceN colour space with more than 32 colourants.

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain a DeviceN colour space with more than 32 colourants.

error.message: Maximum number of DeviceN components (32) is exceeded
